short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dance on street with your everything

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dance away with Street Dance Fighter! 

Enjoy perfect support for section repetition, playback speed adjustment, and horizontal flipping! Record your dance moves through a webcam. Invite friends and dance together!

- You need to press the FIGHT! button to control the player.
- Do not turn off the extension while in use. Unexpected bugs may occur.
- While using the extension, do not manipulate the original video's player bar. There's a risk of feature conflicts.
- If you want to stop using the extension features and reset the settings, please refresh the page (window: F5 or mac: command+r).
- If settings are not applied properly in certain situations, try again for the correct application.
- Upon activating the extension, a unique value is assigned to each user. The webcam address is executed based on this value. Do not distribute the webcam link to an unspecified number of people.
- STREET DANCE FIGHTER operates completely free of charge. Good reviews empower the developer.
